bibl.title: Scheseis geneon kai teknon kata to buzantinon dikaion meta sumbolon eis to archaion kai to hellenistikon. (Sumbolai eis ten ereunan tes historias tou hellenikou kai tou romaikou dikaiou hos kai ton allon dikaion tes archaiotetes.4.)
bibl.seg: Christophilopoulos Anastasios P., Scheseis geneon kai teknon kata to buzantinon dikaion meta sumbolon eis to archaion kai to hellenistikon. (Sumbolai eis ten ereunan tes historias tou hellenikou kai tou romaikou dikaiou hos kai ton allon dikaion tes archaiotetes.4.)
